programme.title: Make Up Stars - T1: Na capa - Queens
programme.desc: Neste empolgante primeiro episódio do concurso de maquilhagem, conhecemos os oito concorrentes, que se enfrentarão ao desafio de criar maquilhagem editorial à altura de uma capa de revista. Conheceremos o júri: David Molina, um dos mais famosos maquilhadores do setor; e Camila Redondo, uma das vozes mais influentes no mundo online da beleza e maquilhagem. E a rainha indiscutível do TikTok, Lola Lolita, visitará os concorrentes. Não percas este novo concurso brilhante e com muito estilo.

programme.title: Paradiso
programme.desc: Rafael é o projecionista do último cinema de filmes pornográficos de Madrid. Está convicto de que todos os dias pode fazer um melhor trabalho.

programme.title: Break Through
programme.desc: Uma peça encenada por estudantes de teatro torna-se num espetáculo subversivo em prol dos direitos LGBT.

programme.title: The Peddler
programme.desc: Daniel Burmeister, um cinéfilo de barbas, viaja de terra em terra a realizar filmes de muito baixo orçamento com os autóctones, e em tempo recorde!

programme.title: Djon Africa
programme.desc: Miguel ouviu dizer que se parece muito com o seu pai, a quem nunca conheceu. Nesta história acompanhamo-lo numa busca poética por esse homem desconhecido entre as memórias e mitologias africanas.

programme.title: Anything is Possible
programme.desc: Serge Ibaka cresceu pobre e às vezes desabrigado nas ruas de Brazzaville. A sua mãe morreu quando Serge tinha 7 anos e, aos seus 12 anos, o seu pai foi à prisão. Apesar desses obstáculos esmagadores, alcançou o seu sonho de tornar-se um campeão da NBA. Este documentário acompanha a Serge na sua viagem de volta para a República do Congo, para mostrar o troféu do campeonato da NBA, mas mais importante, partilha uma mensagem de que, através de muito trabalho e determinação, "Anything is Possible"!

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: Wendie Renard, vencedora da UEFA em sete ocasiões e Jogadora do Ano de 2018 da FIFA, aguarda a chegada de Annie Fortems, uma pioneira do futebol feminino francês, e Sonia Ouchene, uma jovem e promissora jogadora do Stade de Reims, no estádio Olympique Lyonnais. Wendie recorda o início da sua carreira, as suas vitórias e momentos difíceis, como os ataques racistas que sofreu. Annie discorre sobre como a sua geração tornou o futebol feminino francês possível, apesar das ameaças de morte recebidas, enquanto Sonia fala sem rodeios sobre a disparidade salarial entre o futebol feminino e masculino. O encontro das três jogadoras será marcado pela admiração mútua.

programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - T2: Gomera | El Hierro
programme.desc: A viagem continua em La Gomera, com uma primeira prova no frondoso Parque Nacional de Garajonay, onde terão de mostrar como se conseguem orientar às cegas para obter "objetos" que serão decisivos no desenvolvimento do episódio. Daí, "saltarão" para o Valle Gran Rey para fazer outro tipo de salto, o salto do pastor, uma técnica utilizada pelos antigos habitantes da ilha para se deslocarem em terrenos montanhosos, que lhes permitirá obter mais "objetos". Tudo o que foi conquistado pelos participantes será posto em jogo na Playa del Inglés, onde a força e a coordenação de cada equipa serão fundamentais no final desta etapa.

programme.title: Ona Carbonell: Começar de novo
programme.desc: Em agosto de 2020, a nadadora artística olímpica Ona Carbonell tornou-se mãe, uma experiência que mudou de imediato a sua vida. Ao mesmo tempo, Ona embarcou num plano ambicioso para competir nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio. O documentário acompanha Ona durante estes 11 meses intensos, em que terá de forçar os seus limites a um grau extraordinário, tanto física como emocionalmente. Acompanhamos Ona de perto, partilhando as suas rotinas e desafios diários, desde a amamentação aos momentos de brincadeira com o bebé Kai, passando pelas sessões de treino intenso com a Seleção Nacional Espanhola.

programme.title: I Am Breathing
programme.desc: Num ano, Neil Platt deixa de ser um homem saudável para ficar completamente paralisado do pescoço para baixo, devido à doença devastadora que herdou.

programme.title: HairStyle, The Talent Show -Episódios 3 - 4
programme.desc: O primeiro desafio é criar um visual na mais importante das circunstâncias: o casamento. As noivas sabem exatamente aquilo que querem quando entram no salão. Irão escolher o seu cabeleireiro, com quem terão um diálogo para definir a sua visão. Num desafio como este, falhar está fora de questão. A celebridade televisiva e influencer de moda Paige DeSorbo irá visitar o salão e partilhar algumas das suas dicas infalíveis de cuidados capilares. Em seguida, os participantes irão trabalhar nos cuidados capilares, restaurando o cabelo danificado dos clientes do salão. A celebridade televisiva e influencer de moda Paige DeSorbo irá partilhar algumas das suas dicas infalíveis de cuidados capilares.

programme.title: Episódios 3-4
programme.desc: A maldição | Os Vizinhos

programme.title: Ride your Dream
programme.desc: Motociclismo era um mundo de homens, até agora. Este documentário apresenta-nos a Ana Carrasco, a piloto espanhola que revolucionou o mundo das duas rodas e que, desde cedo, teve um sonho claro: ser campeã mundial. Por meio de conversas íntimas com a sua familia e equipa, conhecemos as motivações de Ana, os obstáculos que enfrentou e os sonhos que continua a perseguir. A sua carreira, desde as suas origens numa pequena cidade em Murcia a ser a primeira mulher a vencer um Campeonato do Mundo, é fonte de inspiração para qualquer pessoa.

programme.title: Ettore Bassi: Stage and Race
programme.desc: O ator italiano Ettore Bassi é conhecido pelo seu trabalho no cinema, televisão e teatro. Mas nem todos sabem que também é um piloto profissional de corridas de rampa. A sua vida divide-se com frequência entre as duas paixões e dois cenários muito diferentes: o palco ou a pista. Em 2022, as duas realidades chocam quando tem agendados um espetáculo e uma corrida, em lados opostos da Itália. Bassi decide dedicar-se aos dois projetos, sabendo que o sucesso é quase impossível. A sua escolha e determinação revelam muito acerca do homem e do seu passado...

programme.title: We All Play
programme.desc: “WE ALL PLAY” é um projeto que explora a realidade da comunidade LGBTQIA+ no mundo do desporto. Através de uma viagem à volta do mundo, este documentário inspirador apresenta-nos atletas de elite extraordinários que, muitas vezes pela primeira vez, partilham as suas experiências pessoais e profissionais. Os seus testemunhos revelam visões diferentes e opiniões profundas sobre os triunfos e os desafios diários enfrentados por estes atletas. Dando ênfase à importância da inclusão e da aceitação, o documentário evidencia como o desporto pode constituir um espaço para a diversidade e o respeito, promovendo uma mudança positiva em todas as áreas do desporto e para além dele.

programme.title: Karate-do: O Caminho de Sandra Sánchez
programme.desc: Não é um dragão, mas parece no dojo. Eis Sandra Sánchez, uma das maiores figuras do karate de sempre. Esta é a história do seu percurso único. Dos seus feitos. Uma história complicada que inclui a prática do karate em criança, uma relação abusiva na vida adulta e um penúltimo ano de carreira inacreditável onde que bateu recordes ao competir nos três mais prestigiosos campeonatos de karate – e vencê-los. O caminho até ao sucesso nunca é fácil, mas nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio, Sandra lutou por e contra muitas dificuldades para conquistar um lugar nos anais da história.

programme.title: Make Up Stars - T1: Cor - Futuro
programme.desc: Os toucadores do Makeup Stars são tomados pela cor, com os concorrentes a enfrentar o primeiro desafio com a técnica de caracterização. Seguirão as instruções da maquilhadora Anna Cartés, especialista na técnica das perucas e em apagar as feições dos modelos para criar novas personagens. Agoney, um cantor camaleónico e fã da maquilhagem, visitará o programa para dar conselhos aos concorrentes. Quem será a ""Super Estrela"" e ganhará privilégios para o próximo episódio? Quem terá a pontuação mais baixa? Não percas uma explosão de cor.

programme.title: Daughters of the Sexual Revolution: The Untold Story of the Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders
programme.desc: Assinado pelo realizador nomeado para um óscar Dana Adam Shapiro, este filme intrépido apresenta-nos a história do sucesso repentino das Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders como uma metáfora para o clímax da revolução sexual dos EUA.

programme.title: Paradiso
programme.desc: Rafael é o projecionista do último cinema de filmes pornográficos de Madrid. Está convicto de que todos os dias pode fazer um melhor trabalho.

programme.title: Break Through
programme.desc: Uma peça encenada por estudantes de teatro torna-se num espetáculo subversivo em prol dos direitos LGBT.

programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - T2: Tenerife | La Palma
programme.desc: A aventura continua em Tenerife, com uma primeira prova que terá os impressionantes Acantilados de los Gigantes como pano de fundo e um catamarã e uma corrida de estafetas em caiaques como protagonistas para obter o máximo de "objetos" que serão decisivos no desenvolvimento do episódio. As equipas poderão obter mais objetos na Candelaria, no seu Conjunto Monumental de los Menceyes e na misteriosa Cueva del Viento. Uma nova surpresa final espera aí pelas equipas...

programme.title: The Australian Dream (2019)
programme.desc: O Australian Dream é um documentário que utiliza a notável e inspiradora história do legendário aborígene da AFL Adam Goodes como o prisma para contar uma história mais profunda e poderosa sobre raça, identidade e pertença. O filme irá descompactar os eventos das temporadas da AFL 2013-15 e fará perguntas fundamentais sobre a natureza do racismo e da discriminação na sociedade atual. O escritor premiado de Walkley, Stan Grant, e o premiado diretor do BAFTA, Daniel Gordon, unem forças para contar essa história notável de um dos jogadores mais condecorados e célebres da história da AFL.

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: A família Flores toma o pequeno-almoço, o almoço e o jantar a pensar em futebol. As jovens irmãs Tatiana e Silvana treinam com o seu pai, um ex-jogador mexicano, e recebem dele toda a experiência de que precisam para a sua carreira. Kelly Smith, uma genuína lenda do futebol e a maior marcadora na história da seleção nacional feminina inglesa, espera por elas em sua casa. Antes de se encontrar com as irmãs Flores, partilha com as câmaras do programa os momentos mais duros da sua carreira. Entretanto, Lucy Bronze (Manchester City FC), Melhor Jogadora do Ano de 2020 da FIFA, recorda a sua carreira e partilha algumas afirmações surpreendentes.

programme.title: The Great Journey
programme.desc: Uma família filmada por dentro. O realizador regista a luta contra o cancro da sua mãe, o anúncio de gravidez da sua irmã e as obras de renovação da sala de estar dirigidas pelo seu pai.

programme.title: Safety123
programme.desc: Vistos de longe, os Alpes podem parecer uma fantasia pitoresca, mas quem vive no sopé sabe como podem ser ameaçadores.

programme.title: Make Up Stars - T1: Na capa - Queens
programme.desc: Neste empolgante primeiro episódio do concurso de maquilhagem, conhecemos os oito concorrentes, que se enfrentarão ao desafio de criar maquilhagem editorial à altura de uma capa de revista. Conheceremos o júri: David Molina, um dos mais famosos maquilhadores do setor; e Camila Redondo, uma das vozes mais influentes no mundo online da beleza e maquilhagem. E a rainha indiscutível do TikTok, Lola Lolita, visitará os concorrentes. Não percas este novo concurso brilhante e com muito estilo.

programme.title: Ona Carbonell: Começar de novo
programme.desc: Em agosto de 2020, a nadadora artística olímpica Ona Carbonell tornou-se mãe, uma experiência que mudou de imediato a sua vida. Ao mesmo tempo, Ona embarcou num plano ambicioso para competir nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio. O documentário acompanha Ona durante estes 11 meses intensos, em que terá de forçar os seus limites a um grau extraordinário, tanto física como emocionalmente. Acompanhamos Ona de perto, partilhando as suas rotinas e desafios diários, desde a amamentação aos momentos de brincadeira com o bebé Kai, passando pelas sessões de treino intenso com a Seleção Nacional Espanhola.

programme.title: Give Up Tomorrow
programme.desc: Nas Filipinas, um homem inocente enfrenta a pena de morte num polêmico caso de assassinato que separou duas famílias e uma nação inteira.

programme.title: We All Play
programme.desc: “WE ALL PLAY” é um projeto que explora a realidade da comunidade LGBTQIA+ no mundo do desporto. Através de uma viagem à volta do mundo, este documentário inspirador apresenta-nos atletas de elite extraordinários que, muitas vezes pela primeira vez, partilham as suas experiências pessoais e profissionais. Os seus testemunhos revelam visões diferentes e opiniões profundas sobre os triunfos e os desafios diários enfrentados por estes atletas. Dando ênfase à importância da inclusão e da aceitação, o documentário evidencia como o desporto pode constituir um espaço para a diversidade e o respeito, promovendo uma mudança positiva em todas as áreas do desporto e para além dele.

programme.title: Fast Forward - Episode 1 - 5
programme.desc: Fusão Nuclear | Corpos Biónicos | Limpadores do Espaço | Carne Criada em Laboratório | Blockchain, protocolo da confiança

programme.title: Episódios 7-8
programme.desc: A Tormenta de 18 Dias | Um Novo Começo

programme.title: HairStyle, The Talent Show -Episódios 1 - 2
programme.desc: No primeiro episódio, para se apresentarem aos jurados, os participantes usam a sua capacidade de engenho para criar um visual livre e solto. O único limite é a sua capacidade criativa. Também serão avaliados quanto a cinco técnicas de cabeleireiro essenciais; o último classificado será eliminado. A celebridade televisiva e influencer de moda Tina Leung irá visitar o salão para revelar a sua rotina de cuidado capilar e oferecer algumas dicas valiosas.

programme.title: Karate-do: O Caminho de Sandra Sánchez
programme.desc: Não é um dragão, mas parece no dojo. Eis Sandra Sánchez, uma das maiores figuras do karate de sempre. Esta é a história do seu percurso único. Dos seus feitos. Uma história complicada que inclui a prática do karate em criança, uma relação abusiva na vida adulta e um penúltimo ano de carreira inacreditável onde que bateu recordes ao competir nos três mais prestigiosos campeonatos de karate – e vencê-los. O caminho até ao sucesso nunca é fácil, mas nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio, Sandra lutou por e contra muitas dificuldades para conquistar um lugar nos anais da história.

programme.title: Paradiso
programme.desc: Rafael é o projecionista do último cinema de filmes pornográficos de Madrid. Está convicto de que todos os dias pode fazer um melhor trabalho.

programme.title: Break Through
programme.desc: Uma peça encenada por estudantes de teatro torna-se num espetáculo subversivo em prol dos direitos LGBT.

programme.title: Brother's Body
programme.desc: Quando decide (voltar a) mergulhar no mundo do culturismo, David Nicolas Parel ambiciona seguir nas pisadas do seu irmão mais novo e treinar para o Arnold Classic – uma competição que deve o nome ao célebre ator e político austríaco-americano.

programme.title: Make Up Stars - T1: Cor - Futuro
programme.desc: Os toucadores do Makeup Stars são tomados pela cor, com os concorrentes a enfrentar o primeiro desafio com a técnica de caracterização. Seguirão as instruções da maquilhadora Anna Cartés, especialista na técnica das perucas e em apagar as feições dos modelos para criar novas personagens. Agoney, um cantor camaleónico e fã da maquilhagem, visitará o programa para dar conselhos aos concorrentes. Quem será a ""Super Estrela"" e ganhará privilégios para o próximo episódio? Quem terá a pontuação mais baixa? Não percas uma explosão de cor.

programme.title: Rumeysa: De cabeça erguida
programme.desc: Com 2,15 m de altura, a impressionante estatura de Rumeysa Gelgi é apenas comparável à sua assombrosa força interior. Rumeysa Gelgi nasceu com uma mutação genética rara, a síndrome de Weaver. E a vida não tem sido fácil para a mulher mais alta do mundo. Agora, graças a uma cirurgia que lhe mudou a vida, está pronta a viajar pela primeira vez aos EUA para conhecer algumas das mulheres mais inspiradoras do mundo. Na sua viagem de autodescoberta, Rumeysa contará a sua história e aprenderá junto com outras mulheres que detêm recordes do Livro Guiness.

programme.title: Andrés Iniesta, O Herói Inesperado
programme.desc: Esta é a história de uma pessoa normal que faz coisas extraordinárias. Alguém que persegue e conquista triunfos cuidando dos pequenos detalhes, porque estes são, afinal, os que fazem dele um futebolista diferente. Todos conhecemos Iniesta, o mágico da bola que conquistou dois triples campeonatos com o Barça e levantou a Copa do Mundo com a seleção espanhola. E sim, é claro que conhecemos os seus grandes momentos desportivos. Mas quem está por trás dessa estrela mundial do desporto?

programme.title: HairStyle, The Talent Show -Episódios 1 - 2
programme.desc: No primeiro episódio, para se apresentarem aos jurados, os participantes usam a sua capacidade de engenho para criar um visual livre e solto. O único limite é a sua capacidade criativa. Também serão avaliados quanto a cinco técnicas de cabeleireiro essenciais; o último classificado será eliminado. programme.title: Episódios 5-6
programme.desc: Match Point | Noite Europeia

programme.title: Gigantes - Lendas do sumo do Hawaii
programme.desc: Acompanhamos as vidas épicas das lendas do sumo que transcenderam as suas origens humildes no Havai para se tornarem nos primeiros estrangeiros a ascender aos patamares mais elevados do sumo.

programme.title: Ona Carbonell: Começar de novo
programme.desc: Em agosto de 2020, a nadadora artística olímpica Ona Carbonell tornou-se mãe, uma experiência que mudou de imediato a sua vida. Ao mesmo tempo, Ona embarcou num plano ambicioso para competir nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio. O documentário acompanha Ona durante estes 11 meses intensos, em que terá de forçar os seus limites a um grau extraordinário, tanto física como emocionalmente. Acompanhamos Ona de perto, partilhando as suas rotinas e desafios diários, desde a amamentação aos momentos de brincadeira com o bebé Kai, passando pelas sessões de treino intenso com a Seleção Nacional Espanhola.

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: A vencedora de três medalhas olímpicas e Treinadora Feminina do Ano de 2012 da FIFA Pia Sundhage conta-nos como se sentiu quando foi convocada pela primeira vez pela seleção nacional feminina sueca. Pia acredita que o futebol lhe ofereceu um modo de vida. Pia conversa com Stina Blackstenius, vencedora de uma medalha de bronze na Copa do Mundo Feminina da FIFA e vencedora de duas medalhas de prata em Jogos Olímpicos, e com Molly Johansson, ambas jogadoras do BK Häcken. Stina conversa com as duas jogadoras sobre o que sentiu quando participou nos Jogos Olímpicos, e como jogar em França a tornou mais forte, enquanto Molly revela as suas metas para o futuro.

programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - T2: Lanzarote | Fuerteventura | Gran Canaria
programme.desc: A aventura começa em Lanzarote, no espetacular Charco de la Novia, onde uma prova aquática individual emocionante determinará a formação de duas equipas de 4 concorrentes: a equipa azul e a equipa amarela. Para além disso, a prova dará ao vencedor um privilégio que terá de exercer no final do capítulo: trocar um dos membros da sua equipa por um membro da equipa adversária. Contudo, antes disso, as duas equipas irão enfrentar-se em duras provas nos Jameos del Agua, no Charco de San Ginés e no Castillo de San Gabriel, onde entrará também em jogo o Talismã de Magec, que dará imunidade a um dos membros da equipa vencedora.

programme.title: 265 Days Without Waves (265 dias sem ondas)
programme.desc: Uma história única e extraordinária sobre a criação por um grupo de surfistas locais de uma comunidade e cultura de surf apesar das limitações, numa costa que mal chega aos 100 dias de ondas por ano. Através das personagens, exploramos a evolução do surf bem como a exponencial mudança socioeconómica de Barcelona e arredores, da década de 1960 até à atualidade. Entre os protagonistas aventureiros e dedicados, conhecemos os pioneiros que nadaram contra a maré e a nova geração que vive e respira o surf de uma forma completamente diferente. Frustração, espera e desespero combinam-se em igual medida com entusiasmo, perseverança e humor.

programme.title: HairStyle, The Talent Show -Episódios 1 - 2

programme.desc: The Carcass crew heads out to the NCM Motorsports Park for a High Performance Driving Experience! Then they take their new project car, a Mazda Miata, out on the track to get baseline numbers! Plus we add performance parts to get a boost in power!

programme.title: Detroit Muscle
programme.desc: Adding more Stop and Go to our C5 Corvette Z06 for the track. Taking our Z06 to the Corvette proving grounds, now it can handle the track to strut its stuff!

programme.title: Engine Power
programme.desc: Mike and Pat stroke a vintage junkyard Ford 390 but an unexpected surprise puts a delay in their progress. Then it's full steam ahead for finding the limit for this big block stump puller

programme.title: Truck Tech
programme.desc: After months in the shop the Duramax in our Sierra Denali gets fired after the cooling issues are solved. Then on to the dyno for a custom tune before it hits the dragstrip.

programme.title: Music City Trucks
programme.desc: We upgrade the brakes, repair underside problems, and put some great new off-road and recovery mods on our 2007 Jeep Wrangler JK. Then we'll take it out for a wheeling adventure.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: In her final leg of journey in Serbia, Heather visits the Uvac canyon, tries the locally prepared pie, ending with Kopaonik National Park and the beautiful Jelovarnik waterfalls.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.desc: Pubs in Ireland are much more than a place to drink; they’re an institution. They are social hotspots, centers of cultural gatherings and Irish ‘craic’. Olivia visits the country’s oldest pub in Dublin, the capital city, where she gets to see the love that Irish people have for storytelling. Later on, she goes to the Guinness Storehouse to find out the story behind the dark potion, which is not only the most common beer in Ireland, but also something of a national symbol.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Backpack Jakarta & JogJakarta, Indonesia
programme.desc: Hannah begins her backpacking journey in Indonesia from its capital, Jakarta. Understanding the country’s colonial past, she visits Taman Fatahillah and then Sunda Kelapa harbour. Jog Jakarta, popular for the Borobudur temple is her next stop where she also visits the Batik embroidery factory, ending with a joyride on a bling-bling car and visit to Malioboro street.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 City Breaks Frankfurt, Germany
programme.desc: Christina is in Frankfurt and receives light shower rains.She decides to beat the rains and head out to one of the smaller towns.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Viajar Mexico El Tule
programme.desc: Charlie shows the best ways to navigate the vibrant culinary scene of Mexico’s gastronomic capital, Oaxaca.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 Backpack Mt. Bromo & Komodo National Park, Indonesia
programme.desc: Hannah wraps up from Jog Jakarta after her visit to Sultan’s palace and heads to East Java’s capital, Bromo, for a thrilling experience of watching an active volcano. Keeping the adrenalin on, she visits Komodo National Park for sighting the world’s largest reptile - Komodo Dragon.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Viajar Mexico Villa Del Carbon
programme.desc: From greenery and culture to spiritual power, Charlie reveals the things that make some of Mexico’s towns ‘Pueblo Magicos’.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Sabrina Chakici visits Manchester, the city of football and fashion, the city of heritage and hedonism, the city of the industrial revolution.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.desc: The west coast of Ireland, once considered the end of the known world, is the most magical part of this storied island. Olivia embarks on a journey along the scenic coastal route called the Wild Atlantic Way, to explore the savage beauty of this craggy coastline with its dramatic sea cliffs, windswept beaches and bucolic hamlets. Along the way she stops at Burren, a stony moonscape of karst, where she sees the rugged Cliffs of Moher at the edge of the ceaselessly churning Atlantic.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Xplore Ireland Wild Atlantic Way
programme.desc: Famed for its rugged landscapes and glistening lakes, Connemara is one of Ireland’s most romantic regions. On a trip to this rocky wilderness, Olivia visits some of its postcard-perfect castles. At the idyllic Ballynahinch Castle, she gets to experience the perfect blend of history, luxury and countryside beauty. She also finds herself deeply moved by the love story that gave rise to Kylemore Abbey, a mesmerizing castle that looks like the last page of a fairytale book.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 Backpack Labuan Bajo & Bali, Indonesia
programme.desc: Hannah's tryst with Komodo dragons continues as she visits the Komodo island. Exploring its beaches, she ends her day after snorkelling at the Pink beach. Further exploring Labuan Bajo she visits the Mello village to witness the cultural Caci dance and learn about the Manggarai Culture.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Viajar Mexico Ciudad De Mexico
programme.desc: From the Aztec reign to the Mexican Revolution, the capital of Mexico offers a glimpse into different periods of its history.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Great World Hotels Huvafen Fushi 1, Maldives
programme.desc: A trip to Maldives is like a voyage to a big blue water wonderland. A villa with a floor, which offers clear views of the turquoise ocean and exquisite marine life underfoot, enhances this experience for Kim, during her visit. She pampers herself further with an underwater spa treatment and a bottle of wine from an underground wine cellar, which is like a treasure cave for wine connoisseurs around the world.

programme.title: Backpack

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.desc: The west coast of Ireland, once considered the end of the known world, is the most magical part of this storied island. Olivia embarks on a journey along the scenic coastal route called the Wild Atlantic Way, to explore the savage beauty of this craggy coastline with its dramatic sea cliffs, windswept beaches and bucolic hamlets. Along the way she stops at Burren, a stony moonscape of karst, where she sees the rugged Cliffs of Moher at the edge of the ceaselessly churning Atlantic.

programme.desc: From greenery and culture to spiritual power, Charlie reveals the things that make some of Mexico’s towns ‘Pueblo Magicos’.

programme.desc: Sabrina Chakici visits Manchester, the city of football and fashion, the city of heritage and hedonism, the city of the industrial revolution.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.desc: Pubs in Ireland are much more than a place to drink; they’re an institution. They are social hotspots, centers of cultural gatherings and Irish ‘craic’. Olivia visits the country’s oldest pub in Dublin, the capital city, where she gets to see the love that Irish people have for storytelling. Later on, she goes to the Guinness Storehouse to find out the story behind the dark potion, which is not only the most common beer in Ireland, but also something of a national symbol.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: There is no better place to feel ‘duende’, the spirit and passion of Spain than its lively capital, Madrid. Alex catches some of the city’s infectious liveliness at its bustling squares such as Puerto del Sol and Plaza Mayor. She experiences the Spaniards’ love for food as she tucks into authentic Spanish churros. programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E23 City Breaks Jaipur, India
programme.desc: A quick escape to Jaipur introduces Asmita to the stark contrast in the old and new sides of Rajasthan’s capital city. programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: From being the primary mode of transport for many centuries to helping in the production of olive oil, the donkeys in Cyprus have truly earned the status of the national animal. She also visits Akamas Peninsula National Park, one of the island country’s last remaining wildernesses.

programme.desc: Two of backcountry riding’s finest, Spencer O’Brien and Mary Rand, face off on Mount Kirkup. One of them will advance on to Revelstoke for a shot at taking the biggest win of their careers.

programme.title: Jamie Anderson vs Emma Crosby
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Jamie Anderson vs Emma Crosby
programme.desc: With a renowned snowboarding contest career, Jamie Anderson will ride in a head-to-head battle against one of snowboarding’s most promising rising stars, Emma Crosby, at Colorado’s Crested Butte Mountain Resort.

programme.title: Nils Mindnich vs Victor Daviet
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Nils Mindnich vs Victor Daviet
programme.desc: With their signature riding styles and approaches to natural terrain, Nils Mindnich and Victor Daviet go head-to-head to try and lock down one of six open spots and move on to Revelstoke.

programme.title: Life of Kai
programme.desc: Kai Lenny assembles a surf super-team with Kelly Slater and Carissa Moore for the Backdoor Shootout at Pipeline, then competes in the first running of The Eddie since 2016 at XXL Waimea Bay.

programme.title: Life of Kai
programme.desc: Kai Lenny chases his big wave dream of a title at The Eddie before switching gears to compete against the World Tour’s finest surfers in a high-performance battle down the beach at the Sunset Pro.

programme.title: Life of Kai
programme.desc: Kai Lenny takes off on a 24-hour strike mission for a tow swell in Tahiti and pushes the limits of what’s possible on a surfboard (and on a hydrofoil) for the world’s most innovative waterman.

programme.title: Life of Kai
programme.desc: With big wave season ending in Hawaii, Kai Lenny chases a new challenge in Alaska where he meets up with snowboarding icon Travis Rice to learn how to take his surfing to the next level (on snow).

programme.title: Life of Kai
programme.desc: Big wave champion, ultimate waterman and now a married father of twin girls – Kai Lenny's balancing act looks different in 2023, where his home life and performance goals are ready to reset.

programme.title: Life of Kai
programme.desc: Kai Lenny kicks off the big wave season at Jaws, facing the risks that come with his pursuit of progression, then Maui water safety bands together after fires ravage the town of Lahaina.

programme.title: Life of Kai
programme.desc: Kai Lenny surfs the same swell at both Jaws and Mavericks, then confronts the risks vs rewards of big wave surfing after suffering a serious injury at Pipeline, the most dangerous wave in the world.

programme.title: Life of Kai
programme.desc: Surf brothers Kai and Ridge Lenny relive their epic XXL wave ride at Maui's Jaws surf spot, and Kai lets us go BTS to take a look at his state-of-the-art surf equipment testing.

programme.title: Shires
programme.desc: Filmed over two years and narrated by Rob Warner, Shires is a bicycle film encompassing everything that makes UK riding great – the riders, trails, landscapes and the volatile weather of the British isles.

programme.title: Jorge Prado: Under the Lights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Jorge Prado: Under the Lights
programme.desc: 23-year-old Jorge Prado stands atop European motocross as reigning MXGP World Champion. Now he's chasing a lifelong dream and testing himself by racing Supercross under the bright lights in America.

programme.title: ABC of...
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 ABC of... Red Bull BC One
programme.desc: Dive deep into the history of this one-of-a-kind dance event. The ABC of Red Bull BC One gets you up to speed on all things breaking, from its origins to the energy-filled battles of today.

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: The judges are ready to be dazzled by creativity and fast descents in this first event – in Iowa, USA. The crowds are cheering and the teams have brought all their energy, but will this be enough?

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: The race with no engine and many obstacles will test the participants throughout the day. Have the teams done enough to let their machines race to the finish line or will the obstacles be too big?

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: Fearless teams race through obstacles in their engineless machines. The day brings many cheers from the enthusiastic crowds – as well as many crashes! So who will be the 2022 winner in Spa?

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: To win or To(ulouse)? That is the question that will be answered today in this gravity-powered race! May the pink city give strength and courage to the many participants.

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: A churros-powered descent is taking place in the steep road of Madrid! Who will come out on top and who will crash in the haystacks next to the cheering crowd?

programme.title: Jorge Prado: Under the Lights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Jorge Prado: Under the Lights
programme.desc: 23-year-old Jorge Prado stands atop European motocross as reigning MXGP World Champion. Now he's chasing a lifelong dream and testing himself by racing Supercross under the bright lights in America.

programme.title: Dropping In
programme.desc: Paddy meets up with boundary-pushing Julien Regnier and discovers how the Frenchman, along with a crew of innovators, helped to change the face of European freeskiing with new tricks and techniques.

programme.title: F1 drivers vs hovercraft
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 F1 drivers vs hovercraft
programme.desc: Deep in the Las Vegas desert near Area 51, four F1 drivers put their speed to the test in hovercrafts. Watch Max Verstappen, Sergio Pérez, Daniel Ricciardo and Yuki Tsunoda in action.

programme.title: F1 drivers vs Japanese tv show
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 F1 drivers vs Japanese tv show
programme.desc: Drivers from each team will work together through a series of three challenges to win points for their team. Whichever team wins the best of three will start the race with an advantage.

programme.title: Formula One drivers race as Australian surf lifesavers
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Formula One drivers race as Australian surf lifesavers
programme.desc: Max Verstappen, Sergio Pérez, Daniel Ricciardo and Yuki Tsunoda went head-to-head in an Aussie surf lifesaver challenge – and raced the Can-Am Commanders down the Hampton beach in Melbourne.

programme.title: Ricciardo vs Tsunoda in mini jet boats
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Ricciardo vs Tsunoda in mini jet boats
programme.desc: F1 drivers Daniel Ricciardo and Yuki Tsunoda went head to head in miniature jet boats in Miami's Biscayne Bay ahead of the 2023 Miami Grand Prix. Watch the fun they had racing on the water.

programme.title: Verstappen vs Tsunoda in mega trucks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Verstappen vs Tsunoda in mega trucks
programme.desc: Two-time Formula One World Champion Max Verstappen and fellow F1 driver Yuki Tsunoda went head to head in mega trucks in an off-road race at an iron mine near the Red Bull Ring in Austria.

programme.title: Red Bull Flugtag
programme.desc: A strong headwind challenges the weird and wonderful flying machines. In one of America's great academic cities, which teams will have the engineering prowess to conquer the elements – and gravity?

programme.title: Red Bull Flugtag
programme.desc: Some of the most creative aircraft invade Victoria Harbour in Hong Kong. From Tim Burton-inspired flying saucers to exploding volcanoes, there’s an eclectic variety of homemade flying machines to see.

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: The world's craziest and most creative four-wheeled race went to Brazil in 2019, and this is what happened at Red Bull Soapbox Race in São Paulo.

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: Red Bull Soapbox Race 2019 headed to Finland and things got out-of-hand funny! Relive the craziest four-wheeled race from Helsinki.

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: Red Bull Soapbox Race 2019 went to Lithuania's second-largest city, Kaunas, and teams behind the hilarious motorless race cars had the time of their lives.

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race

programme.desc: The team behind the Red Bull Stratos mission battles mechanical failures, hostile weather, and internal demons to make Felix Baumgartner's historic jump possible.

programme.title: Why Red Bull Must Escape their "Vicious Cycle" to Win Both F1 Titles in 2024
programme.desc: Compared to the opening half of the season, where Max Verstappen utterly dominated the F1 grid, Red Bull has had less success - especially highlighted in the Italian Grand Prix where Verstappen finished 6th, Sergio Perez in 8th. But is this purely McLaren, Ferrari and Mercedes improving beyond the RB20's capabilities, or has Red Bull taken a step back, between Adrian Newey's announced departure and other problems in the team? Bryn Lucas discusses all this and more with Jake Boxall-Legge and Filip Cleeren in the wake of Red Bull's lackluster results in Monza.

programme.desc: After a short but sweet debut at the Italian GP, Kimi Antonelli was announced as the driver taking over Lewis Hamilton's seat at Mercedes F1 in 2025, as the 7-time world champion moves on to Scuderia Ferrari

programme.title: Why Monza Cemented Mercedes' Faith in Kimi Antonelli - F1 Analysis
programme.desc: After a short but sweet debut at the Italian GP, Kimi Antonelli was announced as the driver taking over Lewis Hamilton's seat at Mercedes F1 in 2025, as the 7-time world champion moves on to Scuderia Ferrari

programme.title: Why Red Bull Must Escape their "Vicious Cycle" to Win Both F1 Titles in 2024
programme.desc: Compared to the opening half of the season, where Max Verstappen utterly dominated the F1 grid, Red Bull has had less success - especially highlighted in the Italian Grand Prix where Verstappen finished 6th, Sergio Perez in 8th. But is this purely McLaren, Ferrari and Mercedes improving beyond the RB20's capabilities, or has Red Bull taken a step back, between Adrian Newey's announced departure and other problems in the team? Bryn Lucas discusses all this and more with Jake Boxall-Legge and Filip Cleeren in the wake of Red Bull's lackluster results in Monza.

programme.title: Adidas Outdoor Sports Team - Kayak + Climbing
programme.desc: 1. Two mountaineers explore the “Place of Happiness”. Their goal is to climb the highest Monolith in Brazil in a one-day push. 2. Some of the world´s best kayakers gather for the descent of the Stikine River - the “Everest of whitewater”.

programme.title: Xtreme Verbier - 20-jähriges Jubiläum - Teil 1
programme.desc: Verbier – for many years one of the premiere off-piste locations in the world and home of the legendary final ofthe Freeride World Tour, the “Xtreme Verbier” has celebrated its 20th anniversary.

programme.title: 5 Peaks Project
programme.desc: Famed Swiss mountain-runner Andreas Steindl (26) set a stunning new record: he ran up five four-thousand-metre peaks within 7 hours and 45 minutes – his kind of a perfect “nine-to-five” day in his “alpine office”.

programme.title: Dream Job
programme.desc: A comedy documentary about a girl working in the ski industry who decides to become one of the stars: they go up, they go down, how difficult can it be? Needless to say, she finds out how hard it really can be.

programme.desc: Heute machen wir einen großen Sprung zur GKA Kitesurfing World Tour 2023. Einige der besten Surfer der Welt messen sich in der spektakulärsten Kiteboarding-Disziplin - dem Big Air.

programme.title: People in Motion
programme.desc: People of Motion is a sport documentary about a group of people who turn to parkour in their lives -- sometimes to get rid of frustration, sometimes just to feel the ground and be part of something.

programme.title: Episode 34
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2024 - Episode 34

programme.title: E-Bike World Tour 2022 - Verbier (SUI)
programme.desc: The Verbier E-Bike Festival has earned its special place in the heart of the e-bike community thanks to hosting the most iconic e-bike race of them all.

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2023 Autumn: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean. Get ready for 220km of riding, 30 special stages, exploring North, South, East and West in one mega week!

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2023 Summer: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean. Get ready for 220km of riding, 30 special stages, exploring North, South, East and West in one mega week!

programme.title: Cerro Torre Fly _ Climb
programme.desc: Cerro Torre Fly _ Climb

programme.title: Athlete Profile Marcel Remy
programme.desc: When you hear the name Remy, the first people climbers generally think of are Claude and Yves. For more than thirty years, Mammut has supported and accompanied the two climbers with their projects.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2023 - Stage 2
programme.desc: Das Absa Cape Epic ist das weltweit bedeutendste Mountainbike-Etappenrennen. Die Route ändert sich jedes Jahr und führt ambitionierte Amateur- und Profi-Mountainbiker aus der ganzen Welt über 650 ungezähmte Kilometer durch unberührte Landschaften.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2023 - Stage 3
programme.desc: Das Absa Cape Epic ist das weltweit bedeutendste Mountainbike-Etappenrennen. Die Route ändert sich jedes Jahr und führt ambitionierte Amateur- und Profi-Mountainbiker aus der ganzen Welt über 650 ungezähmte Kilometer durch unberührte Landschaften.

programme.title: Episode 34
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2024 - Episode 34

programme.title: ITF Beach Tennis World Tour 2023 - Sand Series Saarlouis Classic (GER)
programme.desc: Die Sand Series kehrt noch in diesem Monat an den Ort zurück, an dem alles begann: nach Saarlouis, wo die Serie 2021 erstmals stattfand. Der ehemalige Weltranglistenerste Michele Cappelletti wird zum ersten Mal mit André Baran antreten.

programme.title: WES E-Bike World Series Round #3 & #4
programme.desc: In der heutigen Episode reisen wir nach Italien und Belgien zu Runde 3 und 4 der World E-Bike Series. Die weltbesten Mountainbikerinnen und Mountainbiker werden darum kämpfen, wer in der Mitte des Rennkalenders die Führung übernimmt.

programme.title: FIA Karting European Championships
programme.desc: In der heutigen Episode besuchen wir die zukünftigen Formular 1 Stars bei der FIA Karting Europameisterschaft 2023 in Cremona, Italien. Schnallen Sie sich an und starten Sie Ihre Motoren, denn wir werden gleich auf Platz 1 fahren.

programme.title: BetCity Royal Championships Queen & King of the Court 2023
programme.desc: Dieses Turnier ist größer als je zuvor, die besten Spieler der Welt kommen vom 5. bis 10. September nach 'Manhattan an der Maas'. Ein 'königliches' Stadion direkt im Stadtzentrum am Henegouwerplein ist der Schauplatz und Nebenplätze in den Vororten umrahmen dieses Ereignis.

programme.title: Vanora ENGADINWIND by Dakine 2023
programme.desc: Der VANORA ENGADINWIND by Dakine kehrt 2023 mit viel spannender Windsurf-Action auf dem Silvaplanasee in der Schweiz zurück. Der ENGADINWIND ist auch Gastgeber der ersten iQ FOiL U21 Weltmeisterschaft, die für das olympische Programm in Paris 2024 ausgewählt wurde.

programme.title: WES E-Bike World Series #5 & World Rookie Tour Finals
programme.desc: In der heutigen Episode machen wir einen Städtetrip: Zuerst schauen wir bei der WES E-Bike World Series in Bielstein, Deutschland, vorbei und dann geht's weiter zum Finale der World Rookie Tour und ihren jungen Skatetalente in Innbruck.

programme.title: GKA Kitesurfing World Tour The Stars of Freestyle
programme.desc: In der heutigen Folge werden wir die GKA Kitesurfing World Tour 2023 besuchen. Die Hälfte der Kitesurfing-Freestyle-Saison ist bereits vorbei und das ist ein guter Grund, die vergangenen Events und den aktuellen Stand der Athleten zu analysieren.

programme.title: Underdog
programme.desc: The Ultra-Trail du Mont-Blanc© - Edition 2018171 kilometers - 10,000 meters ascent - 2,300 runnersFor the 2018 UTMB© Damian Hall is ranked 50th by the International Trail Running Association© (ITRA© ).

programme.title: Episode 34
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2024 - Episode 34

programme.title: Ötztaler Radmarathon 2022
programme.desc: After many months of preparation, on Sunday, 28th of August, the most legendary cycling event for amateur athletes and road cycling enthusiasts celebrates its 41th edition.

programme.title: SPAR Swiss Epic
programme.desc: From August 16 - 20, teams of two will compete in Switzerland’s pictures Graubünden region for the overall victory and important UCI mountain bike points at the Swiss Epic.

programme.title: Vanora ENGADINWIND by Dakine
programme.desc: This year it's FOIL MANIA on Lake Silvaplana in the Engadin. On the occasion of the iQ Foil Youth & Junior World Championship, the world's best windsurfers travel to Switzerland for the event.

programme.title: LAAX Open - Freestyle Dokumentation
programme.desc: It’s a giant amongst giants, the dream combination of Swiss engineering and American craftsmanship and undoubtedly one of the best halfpipes: it’s the legendary Laax superpipe.

programme.title: ON Surf
programme.desc: ON Surf - A Collection of Italian Surf Movie Classics. Starring the most inspiring surfers around the globe including Leah Dawson, Ale Ponzanelli and many more.

programme.title: Profile - Xavier de le Rue (Snowboarding)
programme.desc: The myth - that is Xavier de le Rue will be our guide and will give us a unique chance to experience the mountain from his point of view when serious business starts - so strap yourself in and get ready for this ride!

programme.title: Natural Track Luge World Cup 2019/20 Final - Umhausen (AUT)
programme.desc: Unlike artificial luge tracks, natural tracks are adapted from existing mountain roads and paths. Artificially banked curves are not permitted. The track’s surface must be horizontal.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2020 - Stop 2 - Kicking Horse (CAN)
programme.desc: Between February 06th – 12th the second stop of the Freeride World Tour 2020 will take place in Golden B.C. Kicking Horse, Canada. After the season kick off in Hakuba, Japan, the world’s best freeriders in the categories ski & snowboard will battle it out.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2022 - stop #3 - Kicking Horse (CAN)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Freeride World Tour 2022 "Live Summary"
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour has its 3rd stop. This takes place in Canada at Kicking Horse Golden BC, (CAN). It will be exciting to see how the Tour continues after the first two spectacular stopps!

programme.title: Actionclip GKA22 BigAir ESP Hydrofoil Recap
programme.desc: Actionclip GKA22 BigAir ESP Hydrofoil Recap

programme.title: Adidas Outdoor Sports Team - Freestyle Kayak
programme.desc: "Go big or go home!" – four athletes in search of the perfect wave. Their quest takes them from Africa to North America. In order to push their sport to its limits!

programme.title: Island Durchquerung
programme.desc: Hans Rey and Steve Peat want to be the first mountain bikers to do a real North to South traverse of Iceland, one of the largest volcanic island in the world. They choose the month of August for their adventure.

programme.title: Roopkund - Der geheimnisvolle See
programme.desc: Following the adventure mountain biker Hans Rey and his team to the Indian Himalayas. Their goal: reach the mysterious Roopkund Lake, a glacial lake in the Uttarakhand region!

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2022 - stop #3 - Kicking Horse (CAN)
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour has its 3rd stop. This takes place in Canada at Kicking Horse Golden BC, (CAN). It will be exciting to see how the Tour continues after the first two spectacular stopps!

programme.title: Cape Epic 2023 - Stage 2
programme.desc: Das Absa Cape Epic ist das weltweit bedeutendste Mountainbike-Etappenrennen. Die Route ändert sich jedes Jahr und führt ambitionierte Amateur- und Profi-Mountainbiker aus der ganzen Welt über 650 ungezähmte Kilometer durch unberührte Landschaften.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2023 - Stage 3
programme.desc: Das Absa Cape Epic ist das weltweit bedeutendste Mountainbike-Etappenrennen. Die Route ändert sich jedes Jahr und führt ambitionierte Amateur- und Profi-Mountainbiker aus der ganzen Welt über 650 ungezähmte Kilometer durch unberührte Landschaften.

programme.title: Titan Desert Series 2023 - Almería (ESP)
programme.desc: Der Škoda Titan Desert Almería ist viel mehr als ein MTB-Rennen. Es ist ein viertägiges Abenteuer, mit ständigen sportlichen und persönlichen Herausforderungen. Ein einzigartiges Erlebnis, bei dem man seine Grenzen auf dem Bike messen und Erfahrungen mit dem Rest des Titan Camps teilen kann.

programme.title: GKA Kitesurfing World Tour - The Stars of Wave
programme.desc: In der heutigen Folge ist es wieder Zeit für die GKA Kitesurfing World Tour 2023. Nachdem wir bereits das Highlight der Kitesurfing Freestyler gesehen haben, gehen wir nun zu den Kite-Surf Wave Athleten über und rekapitulieren das Highlight der ersten Saisonhälfte. Let's check out!

programme.title: European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023 - Geneva (SUI)
programme.desc: Heute besuchen wir die wunderschöne Stadt Genf in der Schweiz für die European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023. Auf dem atemberaubenden "Lac Leman" zeigen einige der besten Windsurfer der Welt ihr Können in den Disziplinen Foilstyle und Tow-In. Schauen wir uns ein bisschen Wasser-Action an!

programme.title: WES World E-Bike Series #6 & #7
programme.desc: WES ist die erste Weltmeisterschaft, die nur für E-Bikes bestimmt ist, der einzige UCI-E-Mountainbike-Cross-Country-Weltcup, zu dem auch das E-Bike-Fest, gehört. Es handelt sich um ein Doppelrennen an einem Wochenende mit einem Rundkurs von 3 bis 4 km Länge.

programme.title: World E-Bike Series 2022 Round 3 & 4
programme.desc: In todays Episode we´re traveling to France & Belgium for round 3 & 4 of the World E-Bike Series. The World’s best male & female mountain bikers are going to battle out who will take the lead in the middle of the racing calendar.

programme.title: Golden Fly Series 2022 - Schaan (LIE)
programme.desc: On September 11th, the world’s best long jumpers and pole vaulters took once again flight on a certified mobile athletics facility that enables the athletes to use the same runway.

programme.title: FIA Karting World Championships (KZ/KZ2)
programme.desc: The first of the two world championship events of the 2022 FIA Karting season offers a very attractive programme with five categories and more than 320 drivers taking part in Le Mans (FRA) from 1st to 4th September.

programme.title: World E-Bike Series 2022 Round 5 & 6
programme.desc: A long and exciting World E-Bike Series season enters its final two rounds in Girona and Barcelona. Who will be crowned the winner of the series this year? Let´s check out!

programme.title: Episode 34
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2024 - Episode 34

programme.title: Gasherbrum II - Expedition
programme.desc: It was one of the last blank spots on the map of alpinism: the winter ascent of an eight-thousander at Pakistan’s Karakoram mountains.

programme.title: THE RIO CAQUETA
programme.desc: Jules Domine and Tyler Bradt, obsessed and addicted to whitewater adventure, make a plan to journey the long way, from the source of Rio Caqueta 1,000 Kilometers downstream to an unreal big water canyon deep in the Colombian Amazon.

programme.title: Sickline - Die Dokumentation
programme.desc: 150 of the world’s best whitewater kayakers from numerous countries meet to determine the Sickline Extreme Kayak World Champion on the legen-dary “Wellerbrücke“ rapids.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2020 - Stop 3 - Ordino Arcalis (AND)
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour 2020 is on its way to Europe for stop number three in Ordino Arcalis.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour - Stop 4 - Fieberbrunn (AUT)
programme.desc: The fourth and second to last stop of the 2020 Freeride World Tour is just a few days away as riders set their sights on this crucial competition in the heart of the Austrian Tyrol.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2023 - Stage 4
programme.desc: Das Absa Cape Epic ist das weltweit bedeutendste Mountainbike-Etappenrennen. Die Route ändert sich jedes Jahr und führt ambitionierte Amateur- und Profi-Mountainbiker aus der ganzen Welt über 650 ungezähmte Kilometer durch unberührte Landschaften.

programme.title: Episode 34
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2024 - Episode 34

programme.title: Titan Desert Series 2023 - Neom (KSA)
programme.desc: Die NEOM Titan Desert Saudi-Arabien macht ihrem mächtigen Namen alle Ehre. Bei diesem Ausdauer- und Orientierungsrennen für Mountainbiker, das durch die bergige Wüste von NEOM führt, müssen die Fahrer in vier intensiven Etappen um den Sieg kämpfen.

programme.title: Profile Marko Grilc
programme.desc: Diese Folge widmen wir dem legendären Snowboarder Marko Grilc. Sei dabei, wenn wir das Leben und die Leistungen dieser Ikone der Snowboardwelt feiern. Macht euch bereit für eine herzliche Reise durch das bemerkenswerte Vermächtnis von Marko Grilc.

programme.title: Winter Games New Zealand - Big Air Team Challenge
programme.desc: In der heutigen Folge besuchen wir die aufregenden Winterspiele 2023 mit der Big Air Team Challenge! Seien Sie dabei, wenn die Freestyle-Skifahrer und Snowboarder ihr Können auf spektakuläre Weise unter Beweis stellen!

programme.title: World Rookie Tour Finals - Freestyle Ski and Snowboard
programme.desc: In der heutigen Episode gibt es die volle Dosis Freestyle Snowboarding und Skiing. Junge talentierte Athleten aus der ganzen Welt können bei den World Rookie Finals 2023 ihr Können unter Beweis stellen. Schauen wir uns das mal an!

programme.title: Episode 34
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2024 - Episode 34

programme.title: LINE OF SIGHT | A Look into Wingsuit BASE Jumping
programme.desc: The golden age of wingsuiting is upon us. Through evolving suit technology the initial inflation time has gone down, which has lead to quicker starts and more exits. Wingsuit athletes Marshal Miller, Jesse Hall, and Sean Chuma take you through the iconic jumps.

programme.title: Profile - Aurelien Routens (Freeride Snowboard)
programme.desc: Aurelien Routens from France is a free-spirited, adventurous snowboarder who has excelled in competition and exploration, having numerous first descents to his name. He was runner-up in the 2013 Freeride World Tour.

programme.title: Skitouren Dokumentation
programme.desc: Weiße Gipfel, einsame Hänge und unberührte Natur: Skibergsteigen ist der größte alpine Trend und die wohl am schnellsten wachsende Bergsportart.

programme.title: Winter Games New Zealand - Park Jam Team Challenge
programme.desc: Building on the success of the Big Air, get ready for the next thrilling New Zealand Winter Games episode, The Park Jam Team Challenge! Witness the fusion of skill and creativity as Freestyle Skiers and Snowboarders showcase their prowess in this high-energy competition.

programme.title: Winter Games New Zealand - Back Country Freestyle Challenge
programme.desc: Back to the third episode of the New Zealand Winter Games 2023! This time, we dive into the exhilarating world of Back Country Freestyle, where athletes shows their skills in the untouched winter landscapes in the southern Alps of New Zealand. Get ready for an adrenaline-packed adventure!

programme.title: Greenlandic
programme.desc: In today´s episode we have the ultimate journey into the heart of Greenland´s rich culture and untamed backcountry. Join us as we explore the breathtaking landcapes of this Artic wonderland. It´s the paradise for every passionate freeskier. Let´s check out!

programme.title: Queen & King of the Court #04
programme.desc: The sands of Doha are set to witness the grand finale of the 2023 Queen & King of the Court Crown Series, marking the culmination of a thrilling series of events that kicked off in Miami earlier this year.

programme.title: Episode 34
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2024 - Episode 34

programme.title: Beni SpeedTransalp
programme.desc: Für die Strecke von Ruhpolding (GER) nach Kasern (ITA), 210 Kilometer und mehr als 10000 Höhenmeter, benötigen Freizeitsportler etwa fünf bis sieben Tage. Benedikt Böhm strebt die magische Zeitgrenze von 36 Stunden nonstop an.

programme.title: Qatar Airways GKA Kitesurf World Tour
programme.desc: Autumn is coming and it's time to get comfortable on the couch. But not for the kite-surf Athletes. The GKA 2022 has its next stop in Dakhla, Morroco and the surfers show their skill on the windy sea

programme.title: FIA Karting World Championships (OK/OKJ)
programme.desc: After three consecutive Finals in wet conditions between 2019 and 2021, the Mondokart.com FIA Karting World Champion-ship - OK & OK-Junior saw good weather and high temperatures for the season over the weekend.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The interim-GLORY Heavyweight Title will be up for grabs as top ranked heavyweight contender Antonio Plazibat (22-4, 16 KO) collides with the number two ranked Tariq ‘Cookie’ Osaro (24-2-1, 12 KO) in the main event. These teammates will have to put their friendship aside for one night and go head-to-head for GLORY gold. Also on the card are title fights in the Middleweight, Welterweight and Light Heavyweight divisions.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: A huge title fight rematch will take place in the main event as rivals Tiffany ‘Time Bomb’ van Soest (24-6-2, 9 KO) and Sarah Moussaddak (8-3, 1 KO) lock horns once again. The rest of the card is stacked with some exciting names and thrilling fights. French Algerian Nordine Mahieddine (27-15, 12 KO) collides with France’s Abderahmane Coulibaly (58-20-1, 25 KO) in a big heavyweight contest, Germany’s Denis Wosik (37-8-1, 9 KO) meets the super popular Albanian Berjan Peposhi (27-3, 16 KO), former GLORY title challenger Karim Ghajji (103-17-1, 53 KO) returns and squares-off against Serbia’s Nikola Todorovic (26-3, 14 KO), and Iliass Hammouche (32-6, 7 KO) will finally make his much...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Badr Hari will go head-to-head with Estonia’s Uku Jürjendal in a GLORY Grand Prix Qualifier. Middleweight Champ Petchpanomrung will defend his belt against newcomer David Meija. Bulgarias own, Stoyan Koprivlenski, will face off with Romanian Sorin Caliniuc. Also fighting is Heavyweight Levi Rigters and Luis Tavares makes his return.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The undisputed heavyweight king of kickboxing will be decided in the main event as long reigning champion Rico Verhoeven (60-10, 20 KO) goes up against arguably his most dangerous opponent to date in interim-heavyweight champ Tariq ‘Cookie’ Osaro (25-2-1, 13 KO). Middleweight champ Donovan Wisse (19-1, 10 KO) puts his title on the line against number one contender Michael Boapeah (16-3-1, 7 KO). Wisse has looked unstoppable so far during his title run but now he faces an in-form Michael Boapeah who holds a win over the only man to beat Wisse. The welterweight division sees top ranked stars go head-to-head as Hamicha (40-2, 30 KO) takes on Diaguely Camara (24-4-1, 10 KO) and Jay Overmeer...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: A huge title fight rematch will take place in the main event as rivals Tiffany ‘Time Bomb’ van Soest (24-6-2, 9 KO) and Sarah Moussaddak (8-3, 1 KO) lock horns once again. The rest of the card is stacked with some exciting names and thrilling fights. French Algerian Nordine Mahieddine (27-15, 12 KO) collides with France’s Abderahmane Coulibaly (58-20-1, 25 KO) in a big heavyweight contest, Germany’s Denis Wosik (37-8-1, 9 KO) meets the super popular Albanian Berjan Peposhi (27-3, 16 KO), former GLORY title challenger Karim Ghajji (103-17-1, 53 KO) returns and squares-off against Serbia’s Nikola Todorovic (26-3, 14 KO), and Iliass Hammouche (32-6, 7 KO) will finally make his much...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Badr Hari will go head-to-head with Estonia’s Uku Jürjendal in a GLORY Grand Prix Qualifier. Middleweight Champ Petchpanomrung will defend his belt against newcomer David Meija. Bulgarias own, Stoyan Koprivlenski, will face off with Romanian Sorin Caliniuc. Also fighting is Heavyweight Levi Rigters and Luis Tavares makes his return.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The undisputed heavyweight king of kickboxing will be decided in the main event as long reigning champion Rico Verhoeven (60-10, 20 KO) goes up against arguably his most dangerous opponent to date in interim-heavyweight champ Tariq ‘Cookie’ Osaro (25-2-1, 13 KO). Middleweight champ Donovan Wisse (19-1, 10 KO) puts his title on the line against number one contender Michael Boapeah (16-3-1, 7 KO). Wisse has looked unstoppable so far during his title run but now he faces an in-form Michael Boapeah who holds a win over the only man to beat Wisse. The welterweight division sees top ranked stars go head-to-head as Hamicha (40-2, 30 KO) takes on Diaguely Camara (24-4-1, 10 KO) and Jay Overmeer...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Endy Semeleer (35-1, 17 KO) will put his GLORY welterweight title on the line against ‘House of GLORY’ winner Anwar Ouled-Chaib (3-0) in the main event. In the co-main event, local fan favourite Nabil Khachab (26-4-1, 4 KO) finally gets his opportunity to enter the GLORY Grand Prix as he goes up against Serbia’s Nikola Filipovic (11-2, 6 KO) in a qualifying fight. Number one ranked Enriko Kehl (52-15-2, 30 KO) will be aiming undeniably book his spot as the next title challenger against champion Tyjani Beztati. The German meets the dangerous Arman Hambaryan (58-8-2, 27 KO) of Armenia.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The GLORY welterweight title will be on the line in the main event as the reigning & defending champion Endy Semeleer (35-1, 17 KO) welcomes the challenge of top contender Chico Kwasi (42-5, 22 KO). In the co-main event, after his crazy GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix performance, the wild & exciting Bahram Rajabzadeh (66-2, 58 KO) steps down to light heavyweight and meets the hard-hitting Paris-based Kevin Oumar (33-4, 7 KO), a French kickboxing champion & budding MMA star. Belgian-Moroccan superstar Youssef Boughanem (187-43-8, 119 KO) steps into the GLORY ring for the very first time in his illustrious career as he meets the Ukraine’s Stanislav Kazantsev (25-8-1, 7 KO). The best of French...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Donovan Wisse (20-1, 10 KO) puts his middleweight championship on the line against number one contender Ulric Bokeme (32-4, 17 KO) in the main event of the evening. Wisse is one of the top P4P kickboxers on the planet today and is chasing his fourth straight title defense. After his Grand Prix heroics, the number one ranked heavyweight Levi Rigters (17-2, 8 KO) returns to action to take on dangerous late notice replacement Nico Pereira Horta (22-8, 3 KO) in the co-main event. The ‘King of The Hague’ crown is up for grabs when rivals Michael Boapeah (16-4-1, 7 KO) and Serkan Ozcaglayan (45-9, 36 KO) clash. The two top middleweights meet in this local derby match-up where the winner walks...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E04 GLORY Light Heavyweight Grand Prix 2024
programme.desc: The eight-man one-night GLORY Light Heavyweight Grand Prix will crown the baddest light heavyweight striker on the planet. The eight participants are: GLORY champion, #C Tarik Khbabez (58-10-1, 28 KO), Morocco. Former champion, #1 Donegi Abena (27-10, 7 KO), Suriname. Former champion, #2 Sergej Maslobojev (38-6, 23 KO), Lithuania. Undefeated in GLORY, #3 Stefan Latescu (17-2, 8 KO), Romania. ‘Mister Cool’ #4 Ibrahim El Bouni (41-9-1, 22 KO), Morocco. The wild & unpredictable, #5 Bahram Rajabzadeh (67-2, 59 KO), Azerbaijan. Top French light heavyweight, #6 Pascal Toure (20-6, 7 KO), France. Veteran fighter, #7 Bogdan Stoica (58-14, 40 KO), Romania.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Spartan Events is into its third year of running its hugely successful promotion, Shock N Awe. programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: A well-known name on the Russian MMA circuit, this fight is Martin Malhosyan's first chance at North American exposure. Stopping this dangerous fighter won't be easy, but Mike Patt's devastating submission win from series 1 proves he's ready. Wisniewski's development as a fighter was a family affair, as he and his brother watched tapes of MMA battles then trained in the front yard. Oganov honed his skills in Serbia, while enrolled in the Red Army.
